title: Delete
overview: If a simple snap from a camera phone can make anyone you want disappear, who in life would that be? Aim and Lily are in an extramarital affair with each other - both are in unhappy relationships with their respective partners. When the ‘Delete' phone serendipitously falls into Lily's possession, Aim and Lily decide to use its supernatural powers to "erase" their partners and start their lives over, together. If only things were that simple…
